name: Power of the Pious
effects: The Aliemus gained by the wielder is increased by 7/8/9/10%, and the Poison inflicted by the wielder is increased by 9/11/13/15%.
After the wielder deals DMG, all Awakeners gain 9/11/13/15% of the wielder's Crit DMG as Crit DMG this turn. This effect can activate once per turn.
If the current realm is "Aequor", at the start of battle, increase the Tentacle Limit and Tentacle Count by 1.

name: Rewinding Time
acquiredFrom: Mythag Shog - Lightless Exchange - 5000 Black Offering
effects: The following effect can only trigger once per turn. After playing the wielder's Comand Card, there is a 30/40/50/60% chance to return it to your hand from the Discard Pile.

name: Hymn of the Sovereign
acquiredFrom: Limited Awaken Rerun OR randomly acquired from Awaken - Aspect of Rotation (can not be selected).
effects: At the start of battle, the wielder gains 25/30/35/40 Aliemus.
When another Awakener uses their Exalt, the wielder gains 3/4/5/6 Aliemus.
If the current realm is "Aequor", after using Exalt, gain Tentacle DMG equal to 2/3/4/5% of the wielder's ATK.

name: Kiss of Repose
acquiredFrom: Limited Awaken - Oath of the Hollowed
effects: The wielder's Base DMG +10/15/20/25%.
During this exploration, every time the wielder kills an enemy, their Crit Rate +2% and Exalt Base DMG +2/3/4/5%, up to 10 times.
If the current Realm is Caro, the wielder gains an extra 15/20/25/30 Aliemus when they directly consume Embryo (cooldown 3 turns).

name: Heart of Silver
acquiredFrom: Mythag Shop - Sediment Exchange - 400 Radix Sediment
effects: After using Posse, gain 1.5/2/2.5/3% of the wielder's ATK as STR and gain a shield equal to 6/7/12/15% of the wielder's DEF.
Using Emergency Gnosis gives all Awakeners 15 Aliemus at the end of the turn.

name: Dusk and Dawn
acquiredFrom: Mythag Shop - Sediment Exchange - 400 Radix Sediment
effects: Gain 125/150/175/200 Keyflare at the end of the turn.
Gain 700/800/900/1000 Keyflare after triggering Death Resistance.
Using Emergency Gnosis increases your Arithmetica cap by 3 and you draw 3 more cards at the start of each turn.

name: Drifting in Desire
effects: The wielder gains 13/17/21/25% more stacks of Counter.
Gain 5/6/7/8% of the wielder's ATK as Temporary STR when attacked.
Gain 9/11/13/15% of the wielder's ATK as stacks of Counter after using the wielder's Exalt.

name: Gift of Decay
effects: The wielder inflicts 13/17/21/25% more Poison.
When the wielder uses their exalt, before the effect activates, inflict 15/20/25/30% of the wielder's ATK as stacks of Poison to all enemies.
After using Posse, the wielder gains 5/6/7/8 Aliemus.

name: Hand of Oblivion
effects: At the start of exploration, add one copy of the wielder's [Strike] Command Card to the deck.
The Base DMG of the wielder's [Strike] Command Cards is increased by 22/28/34/40%.

name: Unbearable Freedom
effects: Increase your Hand Limit by 2. This effect cannot stack with similar effects from other Wheels of Destiny.
Increase the wielder's Base DMG and Shield gain by 9/11/13/15%.
If the current realm is "Ultra": After activating Annihilation, all Awakeners gain 13/17/21/25% Crit DMG this turn. This effect has a 3 turn cooldown.
When entering the Ultra Turn, the wielder gains 35/50/65/80 Aliemus.

name: Dream of the Sea
acquiredFrom: Mythag Shop - Deep Dive Exchange - 5000 D-Jewel
effects: After playing one of the wielder's Command Cards, the wielder gains 1 Aliemus.
This effect activates at the start of battle. Gain 6/7/8/9% of the wielder's ATK as STR. If the current realm is Aequor, also gain 3/4/5/6% of the wielder's ATK as Tentacle DMG.

This effect activates on your second turn in battle, and continues to activate every turn thereafter. Gain 2.1/2.4/2.7/3% of the wielder's ATK as STR. If the current realm is Aequor, also gain 1.1/1.4/1.7/2% of the wielder's ATK as Tentacle DMG.

name: Pale Descendant
effects: The shields provided by the wielder are increased by 4/6/8/10%.
Playing the wielder's [Defend] Command Card triggers 12/16/20/24% Poison stacks on the enemy with the highest HP.
The following effect can trigger up to 3 times per turn. If the current realm is Caro, gain 6/8/10/12% Embryo Fusion when inflicting Poison.

name: Annihilated Rebirth
acquiredFrom: 1.5 Anniversary - Currently unavailable, presumably will be added to the Mythag Shop soon
effects: After the wielder uses their exalt, increase the base DMG of Exalt by 7/8/9/10% and the shield and healing provided by Exalt increases by 2/3/4/5%. This stacks up to 5 times.
After completing the exploration, increase the Affinity gained by the weilder by 10/15/20/25%.

name: Amidst the Downpour
effects: The following effect can only activate once per turn. The wielder's [Strike] has a 55/70/85/100% chance to gain 1 Arithmetica and trigger 10% of all enemies Poison stacks. If the current realm is Aequor, triggering this effect commands 1 Tentacle to attack once.

name: Blade of the Titan
effects: The wielder gains 30/40/50/60% Crit DMG after using their Exalt.
After using the wielder's exalt, all of the wielder's Command Cards in hand have a 20/25/30/35% chance to have their Arithmetica Cost reduced by 1 this turn.

name: Uteri Somnia
effects: Hand Limit +2 (does not stack).
Wielder's Keyflare Regen and Exalt Final DMG + Shield Gen +11/14/17/20%.
Switching to "Tranquil Sea" stance increase the wielder's Aliemus by 15/20/25/30. 3 turn cooldown.
Switching to "Raging Waves" stance inflicts 6 stacks of "Birth Ritual" on all enemies. 3 turn cooldown.

name: Lullaby Devoured
effects: At the start of battle, gain Counter equal to 26/34/42/50% of the wielder's DEF.
After triggering Death Resistance, gain 2 stacks of "Cradle". Cradle: Increase healing and shielding provided by all Awakeners by 15/20/25/30%. Lose 1 stack at the end of the turn.
If the current realm is "Caro", gain 13/17/21/25% Embryo Fusion.

name: Eternal Requiem
effects: At the start of exploration, add 1 [Silver Key Dawn] to the Draw Pile with Destroy.
After using Posse, increase the wielder's Crit DMG by 2/3/4/5%.
When the wielder deals DMG, gain Keyflare equal to 50/60/70/80% of the wielder's Keyflare Regen and 5/6/7/8% Crit Rate this turn. This effect can activate up to 5 times per turn.

name: Wheel Unseen
effects: Increase your maximum Keyflare by 100%.
Increase your Hand Limit by 2. This effect cannot stack with similar effects from other Wheels of Destiny.
Increase the wielder's Keyflare Regen by 13/17/21/25%.

After playing one of the wielder's Command Cards, the Crit Rate, Crit DMG, Shield gain, Aliemus gain, and STR gain of the wielder's Comand Cards is increased by 3/4/5/6% this turn. This effect can stack up to 5 times.

name: The Last Verse
effects: Increase the Crit Rate, Crit DMG, Shield gain, HP heal, Aliemus gain, and STR gain of the wielder's Command Cards by 11/14/17/20%.
If the current realm is "Ultra": Activating Annihilation grants 110/140/17/200 Keyflare.
The first Posse activated during the Ultra Turn has its effect occur twice.

name: Celestial Beast
acquiredFrom: Mythag Shog - Lightless Exchange - 5000 Black Offering
effects: The Base DMG of the wielder's [Strike] Command Cards and Exalt is increased by 26/34/42/50%.
After the wielder uses a [Strike] Command Card, they gain 5% Crit Rate this turn. This effect can stack up to 3 times. Upon reaching 3 stacks, they additionally gain 15% Crit DMG this turn.

name: By Rose Alone
acquiredFrom: Limited Awaken Rerun OR randomly acquired from Awaken - Aspect of Rotation (can not be selected).
effects: Each time the wielder deals an instance of DMG, there is a 40/60/80/100% chance to increase their Critical DMG by 2% this turn.
After the wielder uses their Exalt, deal 15/20/25/30% of the wielder's ATK 3 times randomly.
If the current realm is "Caro", for every Embryo the user devours, increase Embryo Fusion by 16/19/22/25%.

name: Sail of Providence
effects: Increases the wielder's healing by 4/6/8/10%.
After using Exalt, heal 4/6/8/10% of missing HP at the start of the next turn.

name: Spring in Acushnet
acquiredFrom: Mythag Shop - Sediment Exchange - 400 Radix Sediment
effects: At the end of the turn, the wielder gains 9/11/13/15 Aliemus and gain Keyflare equal to the wielder's Keyflare Regen.

name: Fin of Sorrow
effects: The shielding and healing provided by the wielder are increased by 2.5/3/3.5/4% of the wielder's CON. The wielder's Counter gain increases by 9/11/13/15%.
Gain 11/14/17/20% of the wielder's DEF as stacks of Counter after playing [Defend].
At the start of battle, gain STR equal to 6/8/10/12% of the wielder's CON. If the current realm is Aequor, also gain the same amount as Tentacle DMG.

name: The Glutton's Tale
effects: The healing provided by the wielder is increased by 9/11/13/15%.
At the start of the turn gain Temporary STR and Shield equal to 9/11/13/15% of HP lost last turn.

name: Memory Spiral
effects: The wielder's Shield generation increases by 11/14/17/20%.
At the start of your turn, retain 35/40/45/50% of your remaining Shield from the previous turn. The retained shield can not exceed 11/14/17/20% of your team's max HP.

name: Paradoxical Realism
acquiredFrom: Limited Wheel Awaken/Limited Wheel Awaken Rerun
effects: Increase the wielder's Aliemus gain and STR gain by 6/8/10/12%. After the wielder uses Exalt, increase the Final DMG, Shield, and Healing from other Awakeners Exalts this turn by 9/11/13/15%. If the wielder's Exalt triggered Devour, the wielder gains 9/11/13/15 Aliemus.

name: Mannikin of Oblivion
effects: The wielder's Aliemus gained, Poison inflicted, and HP healed are increased by 4/6/8/10%.
After the wielder uses their Exalt, they gain Aliemus equal to 11/14/17/20% of the Aliemus consumed.

name: Flamebound Navigator
effects: The Shield gain from the wielder's Exalt is increased by 15/20/25/30%.
After using the wielder's Exalt, all Awakeners gain 11/14/17/20% Crit DMG this turn. This amount increases by 1% for each Tentacle.
After triggering Death Resistance for the first time in the exploration, heal 13/17/21/25% of max HP at the start of the next turn.

name: Deathless Ascent
acquiredFrom: Mythag Shog - Lightless Exchange - 5000 Black Offering
effects: The healing provided by the wielder's Command Cards is increased by 13/17/21/25%.
All Awakeners gain 5/6/7/8 Aliemus when the wielder uses Exalt. If the Vulnerable debuff is active on your team, this effect is doubled.

name: Twisted Knight Ballad
effects: The wielder's cards gain +20/25/30/35% Base DMG and Crit DMG.

During the Ultra Round, gain Ablaze instead (consuming Ablaze provides double the effect IE 18/22/26/30%).

name: Queen's Edict
effects: The Counter gained by the wielder is increased by 13/17/21/25%.

name: Sunfall
acquiredFrom: Mythag Shop - Sediment Exchange - 400 Radix Sediment

name: Death of Ms. Coral
effects: The following effect can only trigger once per turn. After playing one of the wielder's Command Cards, gain a Shield equal to 6/8/10/12% of the wielder's Defense. For each Tentacle, this amount increases by an additional 1.5/2/2.5/3% of the wielder's Defense.

After playing 5 of the wielder's Command Cards, the wielder gains 11/14/17/20% Crit Rate. This effect can only trigger once per turn.

name: Lone Feather
effects: Increase the Shield provided by the wielder by 6/8/10/12%.
At the end of the turn, gain Shield equal to 4/6/8/10% of the wielder's DEF. This effect increases by 2% each turn.

name: Analysis of Death
effects: Killing an enemy grants the wielder 11/14/17/20 Aliemus and 1% Crit DMG. This effect lasts for the entire exploration.

name: Blue Stone Throne
effects: At the start of the battle, the wielder's Command Cards with an Arithmetica cost of 3 or higher gain the "Immortal Dominion" effect. Command Cards with this effect gain Retain.
When a Command Card with "Immortal Dominion" is played, all Awakeners gain 4/6/8/10% Crit Rate this turn, then remove the "Immortal Dominion" effect from that Command Card.
If the current realm is "Aequor", gain 1 Arithmetica when a Command Card loses its "Immortal Dominion" effect.

name: Adventurer's Pack
effects: After playing the wielder's [Defend] Command Card, gain STR this turn equal to 9/12/15/18% of the wielder's ATK.

name: Critical Point
effects: After the wielder deals DMG, increase the wielder's Crit Rate by 4/6/8/10%. When the wielder deals a Critical Hit, the Crit Rate gained from this effect is reset

name: Kiss of Farewell
effects: After the wielder uses Exalt, gain STR equal to 1.5/2/2.5/3% of the wielder's ATK.
If the current realm is "Caro", after releasing Exalt, gain 4/6/8/10% Embryo Fusion.

name: Never-Ending Performance
effects: At the end of the turn, the wielder gains 5 Aliemus.
After the wielder uses Exalt, the wielder's next Command Card has its Crit Rate, Crit DMG, Shield provided, and HP healed increased by 11/14/17/20%.

name: Cursed Binding
effects: The wielder inflicts 6/8/10/12% more Poison.
The wielder's [Strike] Comand Cards inflict Poison equal to 9/11/13/15% of the wielder's ATK. This effect can activate 3 times per turn.

name: Slumber Beneath the Glacier
effects: The Shield provided by the wielder is increased by 4/6/8/10%.
After using Posse, all Awakeners gain 4/6/8/10% Crit Rate and Crit DMG this turn, but gain Sacrifice equal to 3% of Max HP.
If the current realm is "Aequor", using Posse will also increase Tentacle DMG by 1.5/2/2.5/3% of the wielder's ATK.

name: Mind Barrier
effects: After using the wielder's Exalt, gain a shield equal to 16/19/22/25% of the wielder's DEF.

name: Million Loving Gaze
effects: Increases the wielder's DMG dealt by 6/8/10/12% of their ATK.
If the current realm is "Caro", each time the wielder's Exalt triggers the Devour effect, further increase the DMG dealt by the wielder by an additional 3% of the wielder's ATK.

name: Hope
effects: Heal 2/3/4/5% of missing HP whenever you walk onto an unexplored tile.
After using Emergency Gnosis, all Awakener's gain 100% Crit Rate and Crit DMG.
In "Astral Reign" stages, this effect changes to "100% chance for wielder's Dimensional Image Relic to appear".

name: Epiphany
effects: At the start of exploration, gain 400/600/800/1000 Keyflare.
At the start of a Boss Battle, gain 2 Arithmetica.
In "Astral Reign" stages, this effect changes to "100% chance for wielder's Dimensional Image Relic to appear".

name: Insight
effects: Increase your Exploration Vision Radius by 1.
Gain 15/20/25/30 Black Sigils when the Exploration Stage is fully revealed.
At the start of a Boss Battle, inflict 1 stack of Weakness and Vulnerable to all enemies.
In "Astral Reign" stages, this effect changes to "100% chance for wielder's Dimensional Image Relic to appear".

name: Emerge
effects: D-Mark Stores have an additional refresh available.
Reduce the cost of refreshing in shops by 2/3/4/5 Black Sigils.
In "Astral Reign" stages, this effect changes to "100% chance for wielder's Dimensional Image Relic to appear".

name: Frenzy
effects: Increase the number of Relics available in the shop to 3. The third Relic is a Cursed Relic.
Purchasing a Cursed Relic grants 9/11/13/15 Black Sigils.
In "Astral Reign" stages, this effect changes to "100% chance for wielder's Dimensional Image Relic to appear".

name: Punishment
effects: At the start of a Boss Battle, consume up to 50 Black Sigils to gain 2/3/4/5% Death Resistance for every Black Sigil consumed.
In "Astral Reign" stages, this effect changes to "100% chance for wielder's Dimensional Image Relic to appear".

name: Delirium
effects: The cost of purchasing Rouse Cards in D-Mark Store is reduced by 9/11/13/15 Black Sigils.
The wielder's Rouse card gains Innate.
In "Astral Reign" stages, this effect changes to "100% chance for wielder's Dimensional Image Relic to appear".

name: Whisper
effects: At the end of battle, the Awakener with the lowest Aliemus gains 35/40/45/50 Aliemus.
In "Astral Reign" stages, this effect changes to "100% chance for wielder's Dimensional Image Relic to appear".

name: Suction
effects: Increase the HP healed at Rest Areas by 22/28/34/40%.
After choosing to heal HP, add 2 [Inspire] cards to your Deck.
In "Astral Reign" stages, this effect changes to "100% chance for wielder's Dimensional Image Relic to appear".

name: Blessing
effects: Increase the number of available Orisons after a normal battle to 4.
Acquired Orisons have a 15/20/25/30% chance to be upgraded.
In "Astral Reign" stages, this effect changes to "100% chance for wielder's Dimensional Image Relic to appear".

name: Aged
effects: Gain 400/600/800/1000 Keyflare at the end of battle.
In "Astral Reign" stages, this effect changes to "100% chance for wielder's Dimensional Image Relic to appear".

name: Gluttony
effects: After a normal battle, you can choose to forgo an Orison and increase your Max HP by 11/14/17/20%. This effect can activate up to 2 times per exploration.
In "Astral Reign" stages, this effect changes to "100% chance for wielder's Dimensional Image Relic to appear".

name: Exile
effects: Symptom Cards can now be sold at Black Tide Shops for 13/17/21/25 Black Sigils.
In "Astral Reign" stages, this effect changes to "100% chance for wielder's Dimensional Image Relic to appear".

name: Favor
effects: At the start of exploration, all Awakeners gain 11/14/17/20 Aliemus.
At the start of a Boss Battle, draw 2 additional cards.
In "Astral Reign" stages, this effect changes to "100% chance for wielder's Dimensional Image Relic to appear".

name: Vitality
effects: Junction Areas gain a new option: Remove up to 3 Symptom cards and gain 11/14/17/20 Black Sigils.
In "Astral Reign" stages, this effect changes to "100% chance for wielder's Dimensional Image Relic to appear".

name: Greed
effects: At the start of exploration, gain 15/20/25/30 Black Sigils.
Increase your maximum Relic Limit by 2.
In "Astral Reign" stages, this effect changes to "100% chance for wielder's Dimensional Image Relic to appear".
